title: Lol should go VR to not fall behind?
body:
The new VR systems are out and the big 2 are the steam one and the oculus one. Dota 2 is on VR, and seeing VR is finally here for the public masses I think league of legends should get with the flow of technology and get on VR too, even if only for viewing matches. 
Do you agree?

replies.body:
VR only works as a first person viewing perspective. There are already some side scrolling platformers and they are just terrible.

Honestly though I'm not too interested in these "VR" toys, I'm more interested in tech that directly connects the human brain to computers, that's where real VR will take off.
And then downloading our consciousness into the computer to become immortal!
